summary: An Ordinance relating to, and providing for, the making and repayment of a temporary loan of $30,400.00 from the General Fund of The City of Seattle to "Local Improvement Fund, District No. 3211," for the purpose of paying the cost and expense of the improvement of Twelfth Avenue Northeast, et al., by paving as provided in Ordinance No. 39675 of said city, and declaring an emergency.
